name: Criminal Behavior
description:
There is a burglar loose in the city. He is breaking into buildings of all types to steal anything of monetary value.

We need your help to investigate each crime scene to put together a cohesive picture of the criminal's behavior. Use your detective skills to look for clues in rich and complex environments. Then put the clues together in proper sequence to understand exactly what went down in each crime scene.

You must look carefully for clues, and use some intense thinking and analytical skills to solve this criminal activity. But you must work fast, because time is limited. Help the police department collect evidence and to create an explanation in order to lock this criminal up.
